titleStmt.title: Some stop to the gangrene of Arminianism lately promoted by M. John Goodwin in his book entituled, Redemption redeemed, or, The doctrine of election & reprobation : in six sermons, opened and cleared from the old Pelagian and late Arminian errors / by Richard Resburie ...
titleStmt.author: Resbury, Richard, 1607-1674.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collction, British Library.
